comments.body: Node upgrade is exercised through cluster upgrade during which we first upgrade master to the target version and then upgrade the node to the same version. I don't think we have CI tests for node upgrade itself because node version has dependency on master version, so I didn't add it here.

3 lines below this that I can't comment on (because github), you might want to change it to

```go
masterUpgradeTest := &junit.TestCase{Name: "[sig-cluster-lifecycle] master-upgrade", Classname: "upgrade_tests"}
```

It happens elsewhere in this file too. Just don't change it for the individual upgrade tests.
I think this happens 5 more times.
